items.sentence: Don't you think it seems a little convenient?
Almost all of my classmates can speak French.
Tom is never going to understand this, is he?
Let's cancel our picnic. It's too cold today.
When is Tom planning to go back to Australia?
Have you ever eaten anything that Tom cooked?
Don't throw the baby out with the bath water.
You didn't need to take an umbrella with you.
This is something that I found on your porch.
When will Tom be getting out of the hospital?
